16 SSCMoveCommand::SSCMoveCommand(QWidget *parent) :
17  QDialog(parent)
18 {
19  _ui.setupUi(this);
20  ros::NodeHandle nh;
21  _client = nh.serviceClient<pumpkin_messages::SSCMoveCommand>("move_ssc");
22 
23  _blocks.reserve(32);
24  for (int i = 0; i < 32; ++i)
25  _blocks.insert(i, nullptr);
26  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue config;
27  ros::param::get("/pumpkin/config/ssc", config);
28 
29  for (XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::iterator it = config.begin(); it != config.end(); ++it) {
30  QScrollArea *tabScroll = new QScrollArea(_ui.moveTab);
31  tabScroll->setAlignment(Qt::AlignHCenter);
32  QWidget *tabContent = new QWidget(tabScroll);
33  QBoxLayout *box = new QBoxLayout(QBoxLayout::TopToBottom, tabContent);
34 
35  for (XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::iterator part_it = it->second.begin(); part_it != it->second.end(); ++part_it) {
36  int pin, min, max, def;
37  pin = int(part_it->second["pin"]);
38  min = int(part_it->second["pulse_min"]);
39  max = int(part_it->second["pulse_max"]);
40  def = int(part_it->second["pulse_rest"]);
41  //ROS_INFO("Pin: %d, Min: %d, Max: %d, Def: %d.", pin, min, max, def);
42  Ui::SSCMoveBlocksDesign *block = new Ui::SSCMoveBlocksDesign;
43  QWidget *block_widget = new QWidget(tabContent);
44  block->setupUi(block_widget);
45  block->blockLabel->setText(QString::fromStdString(part_it->first));
46  block->activeBox->setText(QString("Active ") + QString::fromStdString(part_it->first));
47  block->pulseSpin->setRange(min, max);
48  block->pulseSpin->setValue(def);
49  block->pulseSlider->setRange(min, max);
50  block->pulseSlider->setValue(def);
51  //block->activeButton->setChecked(false);
52  box->addWidget(block_widget);
53  _blocks.insert(pin, block);
54  }
55 
56  tabContent->setLayout(box);
57  tabScroll->setWidget(tabContent);
58  _ui.moveTab->addTab(tabScroll, QString::fromStdString(it->first));
59  }
60 
61  QObject::connect(_ui.sendButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(sendCommand()));
62  QObject::connect(_ui.cancelButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(reject()));
63 }
64 
65 SSCMoveCommand::~SSCMoveCommand()
66 {
67  qDeleteAll(_blocks);
68 }
69 
70 void SSCMoveCommand::sendCommand()
71 {
72  pumpkin_messages::SSCMoveCommand msg;
73  for (int i = 0; i < _blocks.size(); ++i) {
74  Ui::SSCMoveBlocksDesign *design = _blocks[i];
75  if (design == nullptr)
76  continue;
77  if (!design->activeBox->isChecked())
78  continue;
79  pumpkin_messages::SSCMove move;
80  move.channel = i;
81  move.pulse = design->pulseSpin->value();
82  move.speed = design->speedSpin->value();
83  msg.request.move.list.push_back(move);
84  }
85  if (msg.request.move.list.size() > 0) {
86  msg.request.move.time = _ui.timeSpin->value();
87  if (_client.call(msg)) {
88  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Command sent to SSC successfully."), 0));
89  } else {
90  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("Error sending command."), 0));
91  }
92  } else {
93  Q_EMIT(sendStatusMessage(QString("How do you want to send a void command?"), 0));
94  }
95 }
96 
97 }
